abstract: In its season debut, “NCIS” is a smash hit, drawing more than 20 million viewers.
snippet: In its season debut, “NCIS” is a smash hit, drawing more than 20 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: It will be an upset if, after the first week of the new season, the answer to that question is not “NCIS.” The first new episode of that CBS drama attracted a huge audience of 20 million viewers Tuesday night, its largest ever. The fact that it came in the 8 p.m. hour, when viewing levels are their lowest in prime time, only makes the viewer total more remarkable.

headline.main: Quick: What’s the Most Popular Weekly Show on Television?
